name: Chronicles of a Dark Lord: Episode 1 - Tides of Fate
name_original: Chronicles of a Dark Lord: Episode 1 - Tides of Fate
description:
Chronicles of a Dark Lord: Episode 1 - Tides of Fate is a RPG game developed by Kisareth Studios. It was originally released in 2010. Kisareth Studios published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
Chronicles of a Dark Lord: Episode 1 - Tides of Fate is available on PC.
